column5: Well, what can I say... At the stream @ 6:00am with a Timmies in hand..  Great morning for fishing with lot of fish caught this year.. The first pic is my first of the day..  The last two, came from one small pool that nobody even knew about on small stream that fed off the main one..  There were 6 in the pool all together...Here are some pics ...    Enjoy !!!!  Tiz
That last male is a pig!  Nice report.
I hope you kept those fish, because you're not holding them in a catch and release friendly manner.  Ouch...
Great report and pics tizfun  Got to love it when the fishies come out to play!!  Congratulations and thanks for sharing Leechman
I'll agree with the last pic, but I don't the issue with holding a smaller fish under the gill plate for a few seconds for a shot and then back in the water.
Those look   good! And yes i am hungry
Beautiful fish tizfun! Hard to imagine something that size would live in such a small stream.

Yes it was a good day and I had released the smallest and the biggest one without any problems.. I understand it's not the correct way of holding a fish, but ( the big one ) I was on my own and trying set the timer on my camera and get a pic... He was in the water and swam away like a champ..  Tiz
